SELECT
FROM cd_user
AND id not IN (SELECT user_id FROM cd_usergroup WHERE group_id = #{entity.groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

SELECT count(1) from cd_user where 1 = 1
and account = #{account,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT id, account, realname, nickname, mobile, gender, last_login_time, create_time, update_time, update_id, deleted FROM cd_user

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
